about.title: About Us
about.intro: We’re a small, passionate team of developers and designers who create fast, reliable, and scalable digital solutions. Our expertise covers web design, custom software development, and business process automation.

highlights.text: We deliver simple projects in as little as 48 hours — fast and professional.
Top-tier developers at fair rates — we focus on smart, efficient work.
We use AI tools to accelerate development without compromising quality.
Deadlines matter — we’ll skip our favorite show if it means shipping faster.
We help teams move beyond spreadsheets to smarter, scalable systems.
Need a company widget or mini-app? We’ll design and build it for you.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: Tell us briefly about your challenge or idea, and we’ll get back to you with the next steps.
contact.responseTime: We usually reply within one business day.
points: Describe the product, automation, or website you’d like to build.
Include information about timelines, stakeholders, and required integrations.
Prefer async communication? Send a few bullet points — we’ll follow up with an action plan.
